AppDB.Name: ECGM_CORE_GLOBAL_THRESHOLDS
AppDB.OneLineDescription: This table contains core PD and DB thresholds.

AppDB.Name: ECGM_CORE_UNICAST_THRESHOLDS
AppDB.OneLineDescription: This table contains unicast PD and DB thresholds.

AppDB.Name: ECGM_CORE_MULTICAST_THRESHOLDS
AppDB.OneLineDescription: This table contains multicast PD and DB thresholds.

AppDB.Name: ECGM_CORE_MULTICAST_SP_THRESHOLDS
AppDB.OneLineDescription: This table contains multicast service pool thresholds for PD and DB.

AppDB.Name: ECGM_CORE_TC_MULTICAST_THRESHOLDS
AppDB.OneLineDescription: This table contains PD and DB flow control thresholds per traffic class.

AppDB.Name: ECGM_CORE_TC_MULTICAST_SP_THRESHOLDS
AppDB.OneLineDescription: This table contains service pool PD and DB thresholds per traffic class.

AppDB.Name: ECGM_INTERFACE_UNICAST_THRESHOLDS
AppDB.OneLineDescription: This table contains PD and DB FC thresholds per interface profile and priority.

AppDB.Name: ECGM_EGQ_IF_TO_INTERFACE_PROFILE_MAP
AppDB.OneLineDescription: This table contains mapping of EGQ interface to an interface profile.

AppDB.Name: ECGM_QUEUE_DISABLE
AppDB.OneLineDescription: This table contains disable bit indication per queue pair number.

AppDB.Name: ECGM_INTERFACE_MULTICAST_THRESHOLDS
AppDB.OneLineDescription: This table contains PD thresholds per interface profile and priority.

AppDB.Name: ECGM_UNICAST_PORT_THRESHOLDS
AppDB.OneLineDescription: This table contains PD and DB thresholds per port profile.

AppDB.Name: ECGM_TM_PORT_TO_PORT_PROFILE_MAP
AppDB.OneLineDescription: This table contains mapping of port profiles to OTM ports.

AppDB.Name: ECGM_BASE_Q_PAIR_TO_PORT_PROFILE_MAP
AppDB.OneLineDescription: This table contains mapping of port profiles to a base queue pair.

AppDB.Name: ECGM_UNICAST_QUEUE_THRESHOLDS
AppDB.OneLineDescription: This table contains PD and DB thresholds per port profile and traffic class for unicast queues.

AppDB.Name: ECGM_MULTICAST_PORT_THRESHOLDS
AppDB.OneLineDescription: This table contains PD and DB thresholds per port profile.

AppDB.Name: ECGM_MULTICAST_QUEUE_TC_DP_THRESHOLDS
AppDB.OneLineDescription: This table contains PD and DB thresholds for MC queues per DP, for each port profile and traffic class.

AppDB.Name: ECGM_MULTICAST_QUEUE_TC_THRESHOLDS
AppDB.OneLineDescription: This table contains reserved PD thresholds per traffic class for each port profile.

AppDB.Name: ECGM_DELETE_FIFO_MODE
AppDB.OneLineDescription: This table is used for Init/Deinit process of configuring DELETE FIFOs mode.

AppDB.Name: ECGM_DELETE_FIFO_THRESHOLDS
AppDB.OneLineDescription: This table is used for configuring DELETE FIFO thresholds.

AppDB.Name: ECGM_DELETE_FIFO_TDM_SHORT_THRESHOLDS
AppDB.OneLineDescription: This table is used for configuring DELETE FIFO thresholds for short packets FIFOs.

AppDB.Name: ECGM_THRESHOLDS_STRICT_PRIORITY_OR_DISCRETE_PARTITIONING
AppDB.OneLineDescription: This table is used for configuring TC thresholds mode for ecgm service pools for both PDs and DBs.
